metadata.title: CVE-2021-40537 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Server Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability exists inowncloud/user_ldap < 0.15.4 in the settings of the user_ldap app.Administration role is necessary for exploitation.

criterions.comment: owncloud: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
